snippet: In response, Old Ox Brewery in Ashburn, Va., compared Red Bull’s action to that of a “corporate wedgie.”
abstract: Red Bull files opposition with Patent and Trademark Office against Old Ox Brewery's use of word 'ox' in its brand name, saying most consumers cannot differentiate between an ox and a bull.
lead_paragraph: In response, Old Ox Brewery in Ashburn, Va., compared Red Bull’s action to that of a “corporate wedgie.”

headline.print_headline: Red Bull Opposes a Brewery That Uses ‘Ox’ in Its Name
headline.main: Red Bull Opposes a Brewery That Uses ‘Ox’ in Its Name
